CREATE PROCEDURE [ConEd].[Archive_usp_ParseSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo] (@Status int output)
AS
--
--**************************************************************************************
--* Name:         
--*
--* Description:  Parse Spanned Con Edison Bills Account Upload Information
--*               
--*               
--* Exec:		    [ConEd].[usp_ParseSpannedBilledUploadConEdisonAccountInfo]
--*
--* Parameter(s):         
--*					StatusCode  int output       -  Execution Return Status 
--*
--*
--* Database:		EC3database
--*
--* Return:			0 Success
--*                 9 Failure
--*
--* AUTHOR:       Peter Heller (PAH)
--* Created On:   06/18/2008
--**************************************************************************************
--* Date         Tech Description of Change
--* ---------- ----  -------------------------------------------------------------
--* 06/18/2008 PAH  First Version  
--* 03/27/2006 PAH  Revised to 
--***************************************************************************************
--
--************************************************************************************** 
--Declare Variables                                            
--**************************************************************************************
--
declare @TempSplitTransactionsSeqid int
declare @UploadConEdisonMeterSummarySeqid int
declare @Notes dbo.notes
declare @Success int
--
--**************************************************************************************  
--SET DEFAULTS                                                  
--**************************************************************************************
--
-- Find UploadConEdAccountSummary reset rows that would override UploadConEdMeterSummary
-- billing revision period.  The criteria is the UploadConEdMeterSummary.ToDate is greater
-- than the UploadConEdAccountSummary.FromDate and is less than and equal to the UploadConEdAccountSummary.ToDate
--
--
update	ConEd.UploadConEdisonMeterSummary
SET             
		BillingPeriodRevision = ConEd.uvw_UploadConEdAccountSummaryOverrideMeterSummaryBillingRevisionPeriod.AccountBillingPeriodRevision
FROM 
		ConEd.uvw_UploadConEdAccountSummaryOverrideMeterSummaryBillingRevisionPeriod INNER JOIN
		ConEd.UploadConEdisonMeterSummary ON 
		ConEd.uvw_UploadConEdAccountSummaryOverrideMeterSummaryBillingRevisionPeriod.UploadConEdisonMeterSummarySeqid = ConEd.UploadConEdisonMeterSummary.UploadConEdisonMeterSummarySeqid                      
-- 
-- Once the override is completed.  Find all of the split transactions that need to be merged with the reset
-- row.  Assume that the number of billing days are less than 30.
--
truncate table ConEd.TempSplitTransactions

INSERT INTO ConEd.TempSplitTransactions
		(UploadConEdisonMeterSummarySeqid,AccountUtilityCompanySeqid, AccountBilled, MeterBilled, AccountExchangeMeterTrackSeqid, 
		AdjustedMeterBilling, AdjustedMeterBillingElectric, OriginalAccountNumber, OriginalMeterNumber, BillingPeriod, BillingPeriodRevision, 
		FirstCancelPeriod, NumberOfTransactions, NumberOfRebillTransactions, NumberOfCancelTransactions, BillingAction, PriorRevisedBilledCCF, 
		RevisedBilledCCF, CanceledBilledCCF, PriorRevisedBilledTherms, RevisedBilledTherms, CanceledBilledTherms, InitialCancelFromDate, 
		CurrentBillingToDate, GasRateCode, FromDate, ToDate, MeterFromReading, MeterToReading, Ccf, Therms, ThermsFactor, MeterConstant, 
		TotalBillingDaysRebilled, NumberOfBillingPeriods, AverageRebillCostOfGasCharge, AverageRebillThermsFactor, BillingDays, BillingDate, 
		ReadingCode, NumberOfDials, MeterType, ProcessedInTheCurrentPeriod, ProcessEffectiveDate, CancelReadingCode, CancelFromDate, CancelToDate, 
		CancelMeterFromReading, CancelMeterToReading, CancelCcf, CancelTherms, CancelThermsFactor, CancelMeterConstant, InitialPostingDate, 
		DerivedFromSpannedBill, SpannedBillingPeriodRevision, SpannedFirstCanceledBillingPeriod, SpannedCCF, SpannedThermFactor, SpannedTherm, 
		SpannedMonthlyPercentage, SpannedTotalPercentage, EstimatedOrActualBilling, FacilityName, ServiceAddress, AuthenticatedUserID, Notes, 
		DateAdded, LastUpdate)
SELECT 
		UploadConEdisonMeterSummarySeqid,AccountUtilityCompanySeqid, AccountBilled, MeterBilled, AccountExchangeMeterTrackSeqid, AdjustedMeterBilling, AdjustedMeterBillingElectric, 
		OriginalAccountNumber, OriginalMeterNumber, BillingPeriod, BillingPeriodRevision, FirstCancelPeriod, NumberOfTransactions, 
		NumberOfRebillTransactions, NumberOfCancelTransactions, BillingAction, PriorRevisedBilledCCF, RevisedBilledCCF, CanceledBilledCCF, 
		PriorRevisedBilledTherms, RevisedBilledTherms, CanceledBilledTherms, InitialCancelFromDate, CurrentBillingToDate, GasRateCode, FromDate, 
		ToDate, MeterFromReading, MeterToReading, Ccf, Therms, ThermsFactor, MeterConstant, TotalBillingDaysRebilled, NumberOfBillingPeriods, 
		AverageRebillCostOfGasCharge, AverageRebillThermsFactor, BillingDays, BillingDate, ReadingCode, NumberOfDials, MeterType, 
		ProcessedInTheCurrentPeriod, ProcessEffectiveDate, CancelReadingCode, CancelFromDate, CancelToDate, CancelMeterFromReading, 
		CancelMeterToReading, CancelCcf, CancelTherms, CancelThermsFactor, CancelMeterConstant, InitialPostingDate, DerivedFromSpannedBill, 
		SpannedBillingPeriodRevision, SpannedFirstCanceledBillingPeriod, SpannedCCF, SpannedThermFactor, SpannedTherm, SpannedMonthlyPercentage, 
		SpannedTotalPercentage, EstimatedOrActualBilling, FacilityName, ServiceAddress, AuthenticatedUserID, Notes, DateAdded, LastUpdate
FROM ConEd.UploadConEdisonMeterSummary
WHERE (MeterFromReading = 0) AND (MeterToReading <> 0) and BillingDays < 30
ORDER BY NumberOfBillingPeriods
--
--**************************************************************************************  
--Main Process                                      
--**************************************************************************************
--
--	DECLARE a cursor to find all account bills that span more than one period.
--
DECLARE SplitBillingAndMeterResetsCursor CURSOR FOR
SELECT TempSplitTransactionsSeqid,UploadConEdisonMeterSummarySeqid FROM ConEd.TempSplitTransactions 
--
OPEN SplitBillingAndMeterResetsCursor;
--
-- @UploadConEdisonMeterSummarySeqid holds the id of the reset meter records which will be deleted once the data is merged
-- and the notes are created
--
FETCH NEXT FROM SplitBillingAndMeterResetsCursor INTO @TempSplitTransactionsSeqid,@UploadConEdisonMeterSummarySeqid
--
-- Check @@FETCH_STATUS to see if there are any more rows to fetch.

WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
   begin
	--
	--	Fetch a split row to process 
	--
	--	Find the split row to conterpart by joining the view and split table.
	--			ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo 
	--			ConEd.TempSplitTransactions 	
	--	WHERE (ConEd.UploadConEdisonMeterSummary.MeterFromReading <> '0') updates the 
	--	the merged data record with the complete summary totals for the period.
	--
	UPDATE    ConEd.UploadConEdisonMeterSummary
	SET		
			FromDate = ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.MeterMergeInformationFromDate,
			ToDate = ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.MeterResetInformationToDate,
			CurrentBillingToDate = ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.MeterResetInformationToDate,
			MeterFromReading =isnull(ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.MeterResetInformationMeterFromReading,0),
			MeterToReading =isnull(ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.MeterResetInformationMeterToReading,0), 
			Ccf = isnull(ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.TotalCCF,0),
			Therms =isnull(ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.TotalTherms,0),
			ThermsFactor =isnull(ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.ThermsFactor,1.03),
			MeterConstant = isnull(ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.MeterResetInformationMeterConstant,1),
			Notes = Common.MeterResetNotes('M',
					ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.MeterMergeInformationFromDate, 
					ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.MeterMergeInformationMeterFromReading, 
					ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.MeterMergeInformationToDate,
					ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.MeterMergeInformationMeterToReading, 
					ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.MeterMergeInformationCCF, 
					ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.MeterMergeInformationThermsFactor, 
					ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.MeterMergeInformationTherms, 
					ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.MeterMergeInformationMeterConstant)+'--'+
					Common.MeterResetNotes('R',
					ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.MeterResetInformationFromDate, 
					ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.MeterResetInformationMeterFromReading, 
					ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.MeterResetInformationToDate,
					ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.MeterResetInformationMeterToReading, 
					ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.MeterResetInformationCCF, 
					ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.MeterResetInformationThermsFactor, 
					ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.MeterResetInformationTherms, 
					ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.MeterResetInformationMeterConstant)
	FROM     
			ConEd.UploadConEdisonMeterSummary INNER JOIN
			ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo ON 
			ConEd.UploadConEdisonMeterSummary.BillingPeriod = ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.BillingPeriod AND 
			ConEd.UploadConEdisonMeterSummary.BillingPeriodRevision = ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.BillingPeriodRevision
			AND 
			ConEd.UploadConEdisonMeterSummary.OriginalAccountNumber = ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.OriginalAccountNumber
			AND 
			ConEd.UploadConEdisonMeterSummary.OriginalMeterNumber = ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.OriginalMeterNumber
	WHERE 
			ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.TempSplitTransactionsSeqid = @TempSplitTransactionsSeqid and
			ConEd.uvw_MergeSplitBillingAndMeterResetsUploadConEdisonMeterInfo.UploadConEdisonMeterSummarySeqid = @UploadConEdisonMeterSummarySeqid
	--
	set @Success = @@rowcount
	--
	-- Complete the processing by deleteing the reset meter row from the ConEd.UploadConEdisonMeterSummary table since it was already merged.
	--
	if (@Success > 0) 
		DELETE FROM ConEd.UploadConEdisonMeterSummary WHERE (UploadConEdisonMeterSummarySeqid = @UploadConEdisonMeterSummarySeqid)
	else
		print 'Update failed for UploadConEdisonMeterSummarySeqid Seqid'+ cast(@UploadConEdisonMeterSummarySeqid as varchar(10))+' - TempSplitTransactionsSeqid'+ cast(@TempSplitTransactionsSeqid as varchar(10))
	--
	--	Process the next row
	--
FETCH NEXT FROM SplitBillingAndMeterResetsCursor INTO @TempSplitTransactionsSeqid,@UploadConEdisonMeterSummarySeqid
   END

CLOSE SplitBillingAndMeterResetsCursor;
DEALLOCATE SplitBillingAndMeterResetsCursor;
--
-- Remove the splits from the ConEd.UploadConEdisonMeterSummary after the merge
--
UPDATE  ConEd.UploadConEdisonMeterSummary
SET              
		NumberOfBillingPeriods = 1,
		Notes = 'Zero number of billing periods set to one to process as a whole period not a merged split'
WHERE 
		(NumberOfBillingPeriods = 0) AND (Ccf <> 0)
